name: NSVisualEffectView.Material
desc: Constants to specify the material shown by the visual effect view.

items.name: case titlebar
items.desc: The material for a windowâ€™s titlebar.

items.name: case selection
items.desc: The material used to indicate a selection.

items.name: case popover
items.desc: The material for the background of popover windows.

items.name: case sidebar
items.desc: The material for the background of window sidebars.

items.name: case headerView
items.desc: The material for in-line header or footer views.

items.name: case sheet
items.desc: The material for the background of sheet windows.

items.name: case windowBackground
items.desc: The material for the background of opaque windows.

items.name: case hudWindow
items.desc: The material for the background of heads-up display (HUD) windows.

items.name: case fullScreenUI
items.desc: The material for the background of a full-screen modal interface.

items.name: case toolTip
items.desc: The material for the background of a tool tip.

items.name: case contentBackground
items.desc: The material for the background of opaque content.

items.name: case underWindowBackground
items.desc: The material to show under a window's background.

items.name: case underPageBackground
items.desc: The material for the area behind the pages of a document.
